text:
<@U04B3M0M18E> I tested it on my end and what you are pointing is correct, the query string is not showing when the user-agent is not present in the request. I don’t know the reason behind it.

I’d suggest opening a support ticket on Trova’s portal – they usually escalate this internally
Can you show me how? We did this, <https://app.HubSpot.com/support-inbox/4329123/ticket/13916778?source=email>
<@U04B3M0M18E> Great, yeah that’s how to open a support case, keep following the thread – I think it is pretty well explained the error with the last message you’ve sent
